participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, enjoys sharing knowledge and encouraging others.
participant_1.background: My painting is my passion, and a Corvette would be the icing on the cake. I am a rapper. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I write children's books. I am studying for my masters.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, values relationships and enjoys leisure activities.
participant_2.background: I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner. I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army. I prefer to walk to places, whether I'm going for a walk with my dog or running errands. I can play piano. I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
I am doing okay! Just got back from a walk with my dog. How is yours going?
It's going great! I'm studying for my master's degree in painting.
Oh that's awesome! What are you focusing on in your studies?
I'm focusing on abstract expressionism. I love the idea of expressing emotions through colors and shapes.
That sounds really cool! I'm not very artistic myself, but I enjoy looking at paintings.
It's never too late to start! You should give it a try.
Maybe I will! I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
That would be really cool! I love the piano.
I think it would be a fun way to relax.
It definitely is. I love playing the piano when I'm feeling stressed out.
I'm glad to hear that! Maybe I'll look into taking some lessons.
That would be great! I'm sure you'd enjoy it.
